synopsis.text: The magical and joyful hololive Summer event is thrown into chaos when three important artifacts go missing along with the mysterious disappearance of hololive's leader, YAGOO. Determined to ensure the long-awaited hololive Summer proceeds, staff member A-chan rallies the hololive members to retrieve the artifacts, rescue YAGOO, and uncover who is behind these strange events. Their quest takes them to a tropical island paradise, but danger and intrigue awaits them. A sunglasses-clad trio seems to be pulling sinister strings, intent on quashing hololive's summer dreams. With magical artifacts, a missing leader, and mischievous villains, the hololive crew faces a thrilling and perilous mission to save their precious event. Through tropical intrigue and mysterious witchcraft they must prevail to usher in another joyful hololive Summer.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
